synopsis.text: The world has embraced a new obsession in 2055: LBXs. These little battling machines have become so popular that professional leagues have sprung up, and some lucky individuals have turned LBX playing into a lucrative career. Amidst this craze, 14-year-old Arata finds himself as a new transfer student at the illustrious Kamui Daimon Integrated Academy, a prestigious institution located on Kamui Island, near Japan. The academy is renowned for nurturing top-notch LBX players and mechanics, but gaining admission requires a formidable feat: winning at least three official tournaments. As Arata and his fellow platoon members navigate the challenges of the academy, they find themselves entangled in hidden secrets and facing off against formidable rivals.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
